    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(int x,
            int y,
            java.lang.String img,
            int width,
            int height,
            int hp,
            int maxSpeed,
            double dir,
            int[] u)
        Creates a new ship object
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate
        y - the y coordinate
        img - the filename for the image to be used
        width - the width of the ship
        height - the height of the ship
        hp - the hp of the ship
        maxSpeed - the maximum speed of the ship
        dir - the starting direction of the ship
